Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Ate jekara tera raba cahuda tam uha lokam nu ika saparada bana dida paratu uha hamesa matabhedam vica rahinage

Sil'ham unham tom jinham upara tera raba kirapa kare. Ate usa ne ise la'i unham nu paida kita hai. Tere raba vi gala puri ho ga'i ki maim naraka nu, jinam ate manukham nala ikathi'am karake, bhara devanga
Ate asim' rasulam de bi'ure vica iha sari'am galam tuhanu suna rahe ham jo tuhade dila nu paka karana. Ate usa vica tuhade kaula saca a'i'a hai ate mominam de la'i upadesa ate na bhulanayoga
Ate jihare loka imana nahim li'a'e unham nu kaho ki tusim apani rita mutabika karade raho ate asim apani mari'ada mutabika kara rahe ham
Ate udika karo asim vi udika vica ham

Ate asamanam ate dharati de rahasam nu alaha janada hai ate sare mamale use vala muranage. Isa la'i tusim use di badagi karo ate usa upara bharosa rakho. Jo kujha tusi' kara rahe ho tuhada raba usa tom anajana nahim
Alipha.Lama.Ra., Iha sapasata kitaba di'am a'itam hana
Asim isa nu arabi kura'ana bana ke utari'a hai tam ki tusi samajhom
Asim tuhanu utama hala suna'unde ham, isa kura'ana de rahim jihara lokam vicom si
Jadom yusapha ne apane pita (yakuba) nu kiha, ki aba jana! Maim supane vica gi'aram tare ate suraja cada dekhe hana, maim dekhi'a ki uha mainu sijada kara rahe hana
